text: Burçin is a Turkish given name. Notable persons with that name include: *Burçin Erseçal (born 1990), Turkish footballer *Burçin Neziroğlu (born 1993), Turkish rhythmic gymnast *Burçin Terzioğlu (born 1980), Turkish actress *Burçin Mutlu-Pakdil, Turkish astrophysicist ==See also== * Burcin * Ivan Burtchin, Bulgarian sprint canoer Category:Turkish given names
title: Burçin
